trends: There have been no other sightings in Lakeshore
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas sitting outside with my husband and i was watching the sky because i had a weird feeling and when i stood up to go inside there all of a sudden from above the tree was this huge bright light that took off extremely fast and just disappeared. No sound or anything. Every night some time while we're sleeping our power goes out.
Summary: Fast bright big light took off over our heads
